basic_info.description: As a full-stack developer, my passion for video games initially sparked my interest in coding. I was fascinated by the process of creating simple functions and the challenge of getting my code to work. This exposure led me to pursue a career in technology, which culminated in my graduation from General Assembly in March 2023. I am excited to begin my career as a software engineer and believe that my bootcamp experience has provided me with a solid foundation to thrive in any company.

projects.title: Click Faster
projects.description: My first project where I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript to create a video game called Click Faster. The goal of the game is to get a higher score than the score to beat. To win, you must click the red dots to earn as many points possible as the timer counts down. Beware! The red dots are lightning fast.

projects.title: Review N Price
projects.description: During this group project, I had a valuable learning experience in the realm of Git. Although dealing with Git issues felt like navigating through Git hell, the knowledge gained made it all worthwhile! Our team used MongoDB to bring life to this project. The website we created allowed users to register an account. Giving users the ability to review any product, edit, or delete their own product reviews. Instead of using images, users could use a video from Youtube. The review came with pricing information and category for each item. Even without an account, visitors could still view all the reviews, but were to modify or delete any product review.
